```markdown
---
name: Bug report / Feature request
about: Use this template to report bugs or request features for FHEM modules
---

## Summary
A short description of the problem or desired feature.

## Reproduction steps (for bugs)
1. Exact `define` command used
2. Configuration / environment details (FHEM version, Perl version)
3. Commands executed and observed output
4. Expected output

## Logs / Errors
Paste error messages or backtrace (sanitize credentials).

## Suggested fix (optional)
If you have a preferred solution, describe it.

## Additional context
Any other context that would help reproduce or understand the issue.
```
